title: enthavanenthavane
sahitya:
enthaenthavane rangayya enthanenthavane


caraNam 1    Agamavanu tadavane ranga bEkadi giriya pottavane mUginda 
bhUmiyanettidane shishu kUgalu kambhadindodagidane krSNa
    caraNam 2    dharaNiya IraDi mADidane bhUsurAnAgi paravasha dharisidane 
bharadi kODaga hiNDa kUDidane phaNi shiradali kuNi kuNidADidane ranga
    caraNam 3    uttidda baTTeya bisuTihane ranga diTTa tEjiyanEri mereyuvane 
duSTaranella samharisidane namma diTTa purandara viTTalane krSNa
